Name: dysthymic disorder
Definition: A mood disorder that involves the presence of a low mood almost daily over a span of at least two years.

Name: atypical depressive disorder
Definition: A mood disorder that is characterized by mood reactivity and positivity

Name: mental depression
Definition: A mental depression that is characterized by a dysregulation of the endogenous opioid system and not of the monaminergic system.

Name: obsolete single episode mild major depression
Definition: A mental depression that is characterized by a dysregulation of the endogenous opioid system and not of the monaminergic system.

Name: obsolete single episode moderate major depression
Definition: A mental depression that is characterized by a dysregulation of the endogenous opioid system and not of the monaminergic system.

Name: bipolar disorder
Definition: A mood disorder that involves alternating periods of mania and depression.
